attributes.action: Get rid of the new 2012 Olympics Logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Have you seen this travesty? It is an embarrassment to the UK and will be yet another reason for us to be laughing stock of the world.  It cost £400,000 to come up with this rubbish.  We must get rid of it now

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
